-   **Factors**

    Lets say you have a categorical variable, and label them in the following way:

```{r}
groups <- c(1,1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,3)
```

and you have scores for those groups on a math test

```{r}
scores <- c(91,87,78,96,68,100,99,88,71,77)
```

putting them together

```{r}
df <- data.frame(groups, scores)
df
```

```{r}
df$groups <- as.factor(df$groups)
df
#changes groups from dbl to fctr so that we can not return values when running operations on groups
#the values of groups are now categorical variables to scores
```

```{r}
levels(df$groups) <- c('Math', 'Computer Science', 'Engineering', 'Integrated Technology')
df
```
